title: Creator
data: The realm of Middangeard was created created by Lloyd Adams

title: Current Age
data: The current age is called "Pax et Gloria"

title: Major powers
data: The major political powers are the Holy Dwarven Empire, The Republic, and the Elven Hegemony

title: Development
data: Middeangeard was the location of several pieces of fiction written by Lloyd Adams.  It has since been expanded on as a setting used in RPG games
